message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.MA, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a logical framework for representing and reasoning about stochastic optimization problems using probability answer set programming. This involves using probability optimization aggregates to allow for minimization or maximization of desired criteria under probabilistic environments. This work involves aspects of artificial intelligence (cs.AI) in terms of developing a logical framework, machine learning (cs.LG) in terms of optimization, data structures (cs.DS) in terms of representing and manipulating probabilistic data, multi-agent systems (cs.MA) in terms of dealing with stochastic environments, and systems and control (cs.SY) in terms of optimization under uncertainty.
